GSD.description:
ALSA: jack: Access input_dev under mutex

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit f68bed124c7699e23ffb4ce4fcc84671e9193cde. For more details please see the references link.
